name: aratu brothers
description:
aratu brother (irmãos aratu - in portuguese) is an action platformer game that is still in development for mega drive.

help the brothers to punch and kick some bad monsters that haunts the city.

here you can download the demonstration version. you can play the entire first level of the game.

controls: START pause/unpause; button A stop music; button B punch and kick; button C jump.
